item.description:
Hi everybody! This month's meet up is all about Earth Day! Pups can splash in our Whirl Pool, explore & excavate the Sand Pit, or Track & Play with Animal (Stuffies!) of the World. We can't wait to see you all again for fun times and to catch up. We have a special Suprise for everyone... Hope you Come Check it out!

Sunday April 22nd from 11:00am-1:00pm
Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Celebrate Earth Day!
